item.title: JavaScript Cheat Sheet
item.description: JavaScript Cheat Sheet Link If - Elseâ‡µ if ((age >= 14) && (age < 19)) { // logical condition status = "Eligible."; // executed if condition is true } else { // else block is optional status = "Not eligible."; // executed if condition is false } Switch Statement switch (new Date().getDay()) { // input is current day case 6: // if (day == 6) text = "Saturday"; break; case 0: // if (day == 0) text = "Sunday"; break; default: // else.
